entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 11:57 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: NE 33 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain mixed with snow early this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
